title: R. Kelly Indictment, Roscoe Wallace, Tyler Perry and more.
itunes:title: R. Kelly Indictment, Roscoe Wallace, Tyler Perry and more.
description:
Good morning.  Today Big Dog talks about his intermittent fasting.  Roscoe Wallace stops by and talks about what he did during Oscar weekend.  R. Kelly spent three days in jail and posted bond on Monday.  Tyler Perry announces his final tour.  More details about Robert Kraft emerge and according to Steve, the league may punish him for real.  Sand and Soul is approaching there is a special extension according to Big Dog.  Comedy Roulette has topics associated with black funerals.  Spike Lee is a bit upset and Trump takes a jab at him.  Today in Closing Remarks, gratitude is the focal point.  It's a must listen!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
